/usr/bin/c++   -Wall -lpthread  -Wall -lpthread -DDEBUG -fsanitize=address,undefined -D_GCXX_DEBUG   CMakeFiles/dgraph.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/dgraph.dir/context.cpp.o CMakeFiles/dgraph.dir/shader.cpp.o  -o dgraph   -L/usr/local/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOpenGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLX.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglut.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLEW.so -lglfw
